abilities.title: Fight smarter, not harder
abilities.text: Choose an Active objective within 3 that is controlled by an opposing player and remove one of this Unit's . If any were removed, remove the opposing player's Control token from the chosen objective. Keep a low profile Each character in this Unit may . If any characters , this Unit gains . Forward planning When an allied Primary Unit within 4 or an allied Secondary Unit within 4 starts its activation, this Unit may use this ability. The activation Unit may remove one condition from itself. The brains of the batch While this Unit has one or more , characters in this Unit add 1 die to their attack and defense rolls.

abilities.title: Primary Unit
abilities.text: When an allied  within 4 or an allied Secondary Unit within 4 starts its activation, this Unit may use this ability. The activation Unit may remove one condition from itself.
